message: I propose dividing the money 3:2. I take $6000, and you take $4000. Let me know if you agree.
I'll take a bigger share this time. Will you accept?
Considering the inflation, I propose dividing the money 52.50% to you and 47.50% to me. This is slightly more equitable than my previous proposal. Please let me know if you find this acceptable.
I'll take a significant lead, but still leave you with something. Will you accept?

Given the inflation, I propose an equal division of the money, each receiving $4995 and $5005 respectively. This aims to maintain fairness while considering the decrease in value over time. Please let me know if this proposal is acceptable.
